review: I am just beginning to sample the streaming, but the set-up was extremely easy. Just make sure you are on the correct HDMI channel (mine is HDMI 2) through your TV input button.
author: Skyarch

review: This was a great buy. More than I expected. 100 percent better than Chrome Cast. No need for computer or phone to cast, just plug in stick and start watching. Great!!!!!
author: Donald Cunningham

review: TOTALLY WORTH THE WAIT!!! SUPER FAST SETUP AND OPERATION!!!!!
author: Robert Nelson

review: A great product with no problems and does more than I expected.
author: Wade Duley

review: Are you kidding me?  I LOVE this fire TV stick!  It is a part of my daily life, now.  I can easily see the movies I desire and move it from room to room!  Great idea!
author: Guitarplayer

review: Easy to set up. Love it!
author: Edwin J.

review: Awesome!  Quality of picture is great, simple to install and easy to navigate.  Price/performance is much better than any competitor.
author: William Elliott

review: I bought this for my daughters room as she doesn't have cable and she loves it!
author: Mia

review: love it.... well worth the money spent for it...
author: Nick L Ciancio
